content.text:
# 24th TCA Awards

The 24th TCA Awards were presented by the Television Critics Association. The Smothers Brothers hosted the ceremony on July 19, 2008 at the Beverly Hilton Hotel.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!width="320"|Category
!width="320"|Winner
!width="375"|Other nominees
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Program of the Year
|align="center" | Mad Men (AMC)
|
* John Adams (HBO)
* Lost (ABC)
* The War (PBS)
* The Wire (HBO)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Comedy
|align="center" | 30 Rock (NBC)
|
* The Colbert Report (Comedy Central)
* The Daily Show with Jon Stewart (Comedy Central)
* Flight of the Conchords (HBO)
* The Office (NBC)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Drama
|align="center" | Mad Men (AMC)
|
* Damages (FX)
* Friday Night Lights (NBC)
* Lost (ABC)
* The Wire (HBO)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Movies, Miniseries and Specials

|
* The Complete Jane Austen (PBS)
* Cranford (PBS)
* A Raisin in the Sun (ABC)
* The War (PBS)
|-

|align="center" | Mad Men (AMC)

* Breaking Bad (AMC)
* Damages (FX)

|-

|align="center" | Tina Fey - 30 Rock (NBC)
|
* Christina Applegate - Samantha Who? (ABC)
* Alec Baldwin - 30 Rock (NBC)
* Stephen Colbert - The Colbert Report (Comedy Central)
* Ray Wise - Reaper (The CW)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Individual Achievement in Drama

* Connie Britton - Friday Night Lights (NBC)

|-

|align="center" | WordGirl (PBS)
|
* Curious George (PBS)
* Hannah Montana (Disney Channel)

* Yo Gabba Gabba! (Nickelodeon)
|-

|align="center" | The War (PBS)
|
* Alive Day Memories: Home from Iraq (HBO)
* Frontline (PBS)
* Nimrod Nation (Sundance Channel)
* This American Life (Showtime)
|-

|align="center" | The Wire (HBO)
|

* Roots (ABC)

Lorne Michaels
|
*James Garner
*Bill Moyers
*William Shatner
*Mike Wallace
